app.title: Freeman's Gamebox
app.contentA: Welcome to my gamebox, here are some of my collection of open source mini-games, this is a good place to pass the time.
app.contentB: If you're interested in adding a new game or improving my code, head over to the project's Github homepage.
app.contentC: Alternatively, you can middle-click on the game to open in a new window and press F11 to full screen.
